Title: Relates to the disclosure of information on the fiscal health of a condominium, cooperative apartment building or cooperative community
Summary: Relates to the disclosure of information on the fiscal health of a condominium, cooperative apartment building or cooperative community to prospective buyers, current owners and the condominium board or the cooperative board.
LawCode: Ren §§339-gg, 339-hh & 339-ii to be §§339-mm, 339-nn & 339-oo, add §339-gg, RP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to the disclosure of information on the fiscal health of a condominium, cooperative apartment building or cooperative community to prospective buyers, current owners and the condominium board or the cooperative board
